dmca.title: DMCA Infringement Notice re www.crystalicing.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Linda Joy Kattwinkel [mailto:LKATTWIN@owe.com] 
Posted At: Monday, August 21, 2006 5:02 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Infringement Notice re www.crystalicing.com
Subject: DMCA Infringement Notice re www.crystalicing.com


Via email: <legal-response@theplanet.com> and Federal Express

George Poletes, General Counsel
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Fwy., Ste. 110
Dallas, TX 75207


Notice of Infringement:         www.crystalicing.com 

We are intellectual property counsel for Sanrio Company, Ltd.  This notice reports a
infringement of our client's intellectual property in compliance with the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
